sentences.en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentences.cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

sentences.en: During the war, Joan helped her mother knit scarves for soldiers.
sentences.cn: 战争期间，琼帮妈妈给战士们织围巾。

sentences.en: He really was one of the finest boxers in post-war Britain.
sentences.cn: 他确实是战后英国最优秀的拳击手之一。

sentences.en: He served as a pilot during the war.
His trial revived memories of French suffering during the war.
sentences.cn: 他的受审重新勾起了在战争中受苦受难的法国人民的回忆。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: Share prices and trading have been dulled by worries over the war.
sentences.cn: 股票价格和交易因人们对战争的忧虑而走低。

sentences.en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentences.cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentences.en: The civil war is obstructing distribution of famine relief by aid agencies.
sentences.cn: 内战阻碍着救援机构对饥荒赈济物资的配给。

sentences.en: The minute that the war started, everybody was glued to the television.
sentences.cn: 战事一起，所有人都盯紧了电视报道。

sentences.en: The war against drug peddling is all about cash.
sentences.cn: 禁毒斗争归根到底是钱的问题。
国际紧张局势迫在眉睫。

sentences.en: The war sweeps up everyone in hatred and recrimination.
sentences.cn: 战争让大家充满仇恨并相互指责。

sentences.en: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
sentences.cn: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

sentences.en: War turns morality inside out: killing and cruelty are virtues.
sentences.cn: 战争颠倒是非：杀戮与残忍成了美德。

sentences.en: When war broke out, he was interned as an enemy alien.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发时，他作为敌国人士遭到关押。

sentences.en: Which do they want me to do? declare war or surrender?
sentences.cn: 他们想让我做什么，宣战还是投降？
